评论详情: These pants are SO good. I am trying to level up my style from mostly jeans or casual dresses. I have sensitive skin and tummy and am very picky about fabric, fit, construction. Have tried many, many brands and styles including flowy, full pants. These more structured trousers are actually just as comfy, and hold up in the wash. Light beige shows wrinkles a little more than the black and indigo, but not bad. Good for travel. Great price. Decent pocket depth. The belt loops are pretty wide, a 1" belt looked too thin so I found 1.5 better. I am just super happy to have found these and now have a classy type of pants (3 colors) that I wear now 1 or 2 times per week.
I love these! I'm tall and having a tall option was great. Amazing fit, true to size.

These pants have very nice fabric. It feels so comfortable and does not wrinkle much.  Too bad I have to return because I wear petite and the short style is still too long. I will look for petite size of this pant style.

These Lee Comfort/Flex slacks fit great.  Light weight and very forgiving.  I'm not sure how the lighter colors will look (ordering the ash heather today) but the black looks great on.  I'm 5'2"-5'3", 130 lbs and the 8 short was perfect....except about an inch too long with my flats.  But at the great price offered, it was well worth it to get them hemmed up.  If you like to wear heels, though, these should work without hemming.
These Lee pants are such good quality. For me, the size10 Short were still too long, but the price is fantastic.

评论详情: I'm 5'5" 150lbs. I bought size 10. They fit well in the waist, butt, and hips. However, they had a weird drape under my butt. I have skinnier legs and they were very boxy in the thighs.

评论概述: Good! just a little big for me :)

I work at an elementary school and these pants have been so comfortable and classy for work!

Super comfortable and perfect fit!  Really great dress pants, especially for the quality and price.

Soon becoming one of my favorite pairs of pants. They look nice—not cheap—they are flattering and super comfortable. I bought a size 6, and they fit great (hips: 39 in, height: 5 ft 6 in, hourglass shape). I like them so much that I am going to buy them in more colors.

These are the best dress pants I've ever owned. I got them, tried them on, and ordered another pair in a different color right away. They fit perfectly everywhere! The stretchiness is fantastic! Hides any ab issues. Length is perfect. Material seems very durable and comfortable. I've been avoiding wearing any other type of pants than leggings, but these pants are unbelievable. Thank you, Lee! I am hoping other colors will also be reduced in price so I can afford to order more! I am an athletic build, 5' 6.5" and weigh 145 lbs. and the size 12 is very roomy. I LOVE these pants for work. Just received them in the mail, and I’m shocked by how nicely they fit. They actually look better in person. I am 5’9”153lbs, rectangle body shape, and usually wear a 33 or 34 inch inseam. I ordered the 10 long and they fit like a glove. The stretch in the waist is also super comfortable. I will be ordering more colors for sure.

Fit, color, size fit 5’2”  170 lbs  perfect

Upon returning to in-person office work after several years of remote-working in “soft pants”, I was not too jazzed about trying to find pants that fit my new (ahem) size, were long enough, flattering, low-maintenance (see also: no ironing), yet professional. I have to dress like an adult but my work entails a lot of movement. THESE PANTS ARE THE BEST. They’re more comfortable than jeans, flattering (no muffin top, no butt-flattening), easy (normal wash and dry, sometimes even hang them up afterwards instead of leaving them in the basket; they’ll probably last longer if you treat them better). After A YEAR of wearing one pair 1-2 times per week and generally being tough on them, they’re still ready to go from my dryer (likely after two days of sitting there) to a meeting with heels and a tailored jacket to boots and a hoodie in the field, yet still be comfy enough for a tee and sneakers on the weekend.  I freakin’ love these pants.  And yes, they have real pockets.

Love these pants ! I ordered a 14 that they recommended and a 12 short. Im 5"4" The 12 fit great. So sent the 14 back.  They where still very long. So I had to cut and hem them. I ordered another pair already.  Great pants.
I bought new but received used. You can see the marks in the crotch from someone sitting in them. No tags and the tag on the inside has been removed. No idea the size nor will I even be trying on 🤮

These slacks are true to size and fit very well. They do wrinkle some after washing. But a quick warm ironing or steaming takes the wrinkles out quickly. The length is good for flats or low heelsLoved them so much that I ordered two more in different colors. I wish they came in additional colors.
Fits nice, true to size, comfortable, & I always get compliments when I wear them.
These are my all time favorite jeans.  No gap at the waist and very comfortable.  The price was absolutely wonderful.  I think I’ve purchase 3 pairs in the past 6 months.  Highly recommend.
These are very nice slacks. If you had any doubts, just buy them.
Please size up!! I normal wore a m-L but I read the reviews and listened and got a long l!! Fits perfectly

I live in tee shirts and shorts: all sorts of tees, and all sorts of shorts.  Now I needed some slacks/pants to wear for a couple of business casual, not jeans meetings.  I cannot believe how nice these look and feel right out of the washer and dryer.  I live in Florida and it is a bit chilly today so I am wearing the navy ones to meet a friend for a late breakfast.  I am perfectly comfortable and usually, as soon as I get home I change into my most comfortable pants or shorts but with these, I am good for the day.  I can be perfectly comfortable and look like an adult.  :)
I liked the fit ,the fabric was a little lighter than expected. I didn't like the wider legs though. I got a tall and they were plenty Ling.

I exchanged for size 8 which is my usual size and they’re perfect! Plan to get them in other colors. Thanks!
They were too big and length was too long.  Also had a slightly flared leg that I didn't want.
These pants are wide thru the legs and boot cut. It doesn't match the listing photos. I will be returning these size 8 short pants that drown my legs. This is a disappointing purchase.
I ordered a size 10, I typically a wear an 8.  The 10 was better for me, I do not like a snug fit.  I weigh 135 pounds.  I ordered black and they really look nice.
Nice fit and feel with a little stretch.  Please size up at least one size.  Legs too wide for me.  Had to get them tapered from tailors.

Nice light weight slacks. Washes and dries great. Great for work. Legs are a bit wider than I thought they would be. I have others in the same line, but the black ones are a magnet for attracting lint. I ended up returning them for this reason.

I ordered these pants for work, they couldn’t fit better! They are the perfect length, fit my waist perfectly and hug me in just the right places without being too tight. I am 5’6” and ~155lbs so I ordered a size 8. The front pockets are decently sized so I can fit my phone. I wish I could find jeans that fit me this nicely!! Overall, I would recommend!
I should have ordered a 10. I plan on losing a few lbs so I'll keep them.
These pants feel nice , they are just too long, and they are marked ‘short’. Looks nice, fits well.

I loved the way these pants fit. I would have definitely kept them but, after removing the size sticker, a residue was left on the pants. I had returned a previous pair thinking maybe it was a fluke but, now the second pair did the same. Lee needs to change the glue they are using.
Perfect stretch, long is the perfect length and the sale price is perfect as well! So comfortable. Back for more colors.

I bought two pair of these pants. The first pair was fine. When I received the second pair I took the tags off  and washed them so they would be ready to wear. They were far too big. Looking at the inside tag on the pants, they were 10 longs, I ordered 4 longs and the tags I took of read 4 long.
Grateful that short sizes are available - the length is perfect & overall fit is great! These are very comfortable with just enough stretch. Wish there were more colors ~
